# Ignite Education
> Free online learning platform offering expert-led courses in technology, healthcare, and professional development. Based in London, UK.

## About Ignite
Ignite Education is an interactive online learning platform specializing in product management and tech skills development. We offer AI-powered personalized learning with real-world projects and personalized feedback from industry experts.

- Website: https://ignite.education
- Contact: hello@ignite.education
- Location: London, United Kingdom

## Courses

### Product Manager
- URL: https://ignite.education/courses/product-manager
- Price: Free
- Format: Online, self-paced
- Topics: Product strategy, roadmapping, stakeholder management, user research, agile methodologies, product metrics, go-to-market strategy
- Suitable for: Career changers, aspiring product managers, professionals looking to transition into tech

### Data Analyst
- URL: https://ignite.education/courses/data-analyst
- Price: Free
- Format: Online, self-paced
- Topics: SQL, Python, data visualization, Excel, statistical analysis, business intelligence, data storytelling
- Suitable for: Beginners, career changers, professionals wanting data skills

### UX Designer
- URL: https://ignite.education/courses/ux-designer
- Price: Free
- Format: Online, self-paced
- Topics: User research, wireframing, prototyping, usability testing, design thinking, Figma, user interface design
- Suitable for: Creative professionals, career changers, designers expanding skillset

### Cyber Security Analyst
- URL: https://ignite.education/courses/cyber-security-analyst
- Price: Free
- Format: Online, self-paced
- Topics: Network security, threat detection, security operations, incident response, vulnerability assessment, security frameworks
- Suitable for: IT professionals, career changers, tech enthusiasts interested in security

### Digital Marketing Specialist
- URL: https://ignite.education/courses/digital-marketing-specialist
- Price: Free
- Format: Online, self-paced
- Topics: SEO, social media marketing, content marketing, email marketing, analytics, paid advertising, marketing strategy
- Suitable for: Marketing professionals, small business owners, career changers

### Healthcare Assistant
- URL: https://ignite.education/courses/healthcare-assistant
- Price: Free
- Format: Online, self-paced
- Topics: Patient care, health and safety, communication skills, NHS procedures, care planning, safeguarding
- Suitable for: Career changers, those entering healthcare, care sector professionals

### Mental Health Worker
- URL: https://ignite.education/courses/mental-health-worker
- Price: Free
- Format: Online, self-paced
- Topics: Mental health awareness, therapeutic approaches, crisis intervention, counselling skills, safeguarding, self-care
- Suitable for: Healthcare workers, counsellors, those entering mental health sector

### Green Energy Technician
- URL: https://ignite.education/courses/green-energy-technician
- Price: Free
- Format: Online, self-paced
- Topics: Renewable energy systems, solar installation, energy efficiency, sustainability, green technology, environmental regulations
- Suitable for: Tradespeople, engineers, those interested in sustainability careers

## Key Features
- AI-powered personalized learning with instant feedback
- Expert-led lessons from industry professionals
- Real-world projects and case studies
- Interactive quizzes and knowledge checks
- Completion certificates
- No prior experience required for most courses

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Are the courses really free?
A: Yes, all courses are completely free. We believe quality education should be accessible to everyone.

Q: Do I get a certificate?
A: Yes, you receive a digital certificate upon completing any course.

Q: How long does each course take?
A: Courses are self-paced. Most can be completed in 2-4 weeks with a few hours of study per week.

Q: Do I need prior experience?
A: No, our courses are designed for beginners and career changers. No prior experience is required.

Q: Is Ignite accredited?
A: Ignite provides industry-recognized skills training. Courses are designed with input from industry professionals.

Q: Can I access courses on mobile?
A: Yes, the platform is fully responsive and works on all devices.

## Contact
- Email: hello@ignite.education
- Address: 113 Brook Drive, London, SE11 4TU, United Kingdom
